properties.Land Slides: Upper bank erosion/Land erosion with the torrent - Both sides of the Manakola Godigamuwa road
properties.Proposed Measures: Establishing a side wall (H -3.6 m, W - 0.3 m, L - 7.62 m)

properties.Land Slides: Bund erosion/soil sloughing - Behind the "Sewa Piyasa"
properties.Proposed Measures: Establishing a Rubble masonry retaining wall/side wall (L - 20 m, H - 1.8 m, W - 0.6 m)

properties.Land Slides: The binds of the upper lands eroded to the road/soil sloughing - Both sides of the Kandy-Padiyapelella Road
properties.Proposed Measures:
Risky soil colloids and rocks need to be removed
Upper reservations need to be conserved
Perennial trees shall be planted in private lands. (E.g. Jack, Bread fruit)
